Title: M-4 FIGHTER COVER DEFENSE
Description: Roll one die for each wave; roll needed to get the number of fighters driven off.

1.description: 1 fighter driven off initial attack, 0 on successive

2.description: 1 fighter driven off initial attack, 0 on successive

3.description: 1 fighter driven off initial attack, 0 on successive

4.description: 2 fighters driven off initial attack, 1 on successive

5.description: 2 fighters driven off initial attack, 1 on successive

6.description: 3 fighters driven off initial attack, 2 on successive

1.description: 1 fighter driven off initial attack, 0 on successive

2.description: 2 fighters driven off initial attack, 1 on successive

3.description: 2 fighters driven off initial attack, 1 on successive

4.description: 3 fighters driven off initial attack, 1 on successive

5.description: 3 fighters driven off initial attack, 2 on successive

6.description: 4 fighters driven off initial attack, 2 on successive

1.description: 1 fighter driven off initial attack, 1 on successive

2.description: 2 fighters driven off initial attack, 1 on successive

3.description: 2 fighters driven off initial attack, 1 on successive

4.description: 3 fighters driven off initial attack, 2 on successive

5.description: 4 fighters driven off initial attack, 2 on successive

6.description: 5 fighters driven off initial attack, 3 on successive

notes: Notes: The first number is the number of fighters driven off before the initial attack and the second number if attacked again (successive attack phase).
Aggressive 'Little Friends' (Random Event): Roll for fighter cover defense +1 for remainder of the mission.
